plot: A darkly twisted comedy about a lonely dead girl who tries to bring herself back to life in order to make new friends.
title: Evelyn: The Cutest Evil Dead Girl
plot_es: A darkly twisted comedy about a lonely dead girl who tries to bring herself back to life in order to make new friends.
original_name: Evelyn: The Cutest Evil Dead Girl
plot_en: A darkly twisted comedy about a lonely dead girl who tries to bring herself back to life in order to make new friends.
